text: Python and MySQL: is there an alternative to MySQLdb?
Is there a module written purely in Python that will allow a script to communicate with a MySQL database?
I've already tried MySQLdb without success.
It requires too much: GCC, zlib, and openssl.
I do not have access to these tools; even if I did, I don't want to waste time getting them to work together.
I'm looking for tools that will make my work easier.
Can someone point me in the direction of a MySQL Python module written in Python?
If not, tips on writing my own code for communicating with MySQL would be appreciated.
